mapper.sql: BOOKING_HISTORY.ID BOOKINGHISTORY_ID, BOOKING_HISTORY.BOOKING_ID BOOKINGHISTORY_BOOKINGID, BOOKING_HISTORY.USER_ID BOOKINGHISTORY_USERID, BOOKING_HISTORY.OPT_NAME BOOKINGHISTORY_OPTNAME, BOOKING_HISTORY.REMARK BOOKINGHISTORY_REMARK, BOOKING_HISTORY.PRE_STATUS BOOKINGHISTORY_PRESTATUS, BOOKING_HISTORY.POST_STATUS BOOKINGHISTORY_POSTSTATUS, BOOKING_HISTORY.NORMAL BOOKINGHISTORY_NORMAL, BOOKING_HISTORY.CREATE_TIME BOOKINGHISTORY_CREATETIME, BOOKING_HISTORY.ENABLED BOOKINGHISTORY_ENABLED, BOOKING_HISTORY.DELETED BOOKINGHISTORY_DELETED, BOOKING_HISTORY.PARTNER_ID BOOKINGHISTORY_PARTNERID
mapper.insert:
insert into BOOKING_HISTORY
BOOKING_ID,
USER_ID,
OPT_NAME,
REMARK,
PRE_STATUS,
POST_STATUS,
NORMAL,
CREATE_TIME,
ENABLED,
PARTNER_ID,
#{bookingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{optName,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{preStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{postStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{normal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
update BOOKING_HISTORY
BOOKING_ID = #{bookingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OPT_NAME = #{optName,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRE_STATUS = #{preStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POST_STATUS = #{postStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NORMAL = #{normal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from BOOKING_HISTORY where DELETED = 0
select count(ID) from BOOKING_HISTORY where DELETED = 0
